metadata.title: CVE-2016-3937 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MediaTek video driver in Android before 2016-10-05 allows attackers togain privileges via a crafted application, aka Android internal bug30030994 and MediaTek internal bug ALPS02834874.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
linux-grouper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-utopic: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
